website_summaries.verdict: Good quality on a natural fiber brush that offers 2 levels of firmness for exfoliating and cleaning.
pros: Long handle helps you reach the middle of your back
Bristles are sturdy and still soft
Handle is easy to hold and doesn't slip
cons: The stiff bristles may be a little softer than you may need

customer_reviews.title: Bristles got smashed after first use.
customer_reviews.text: The "stiff" bristles got smashed down the first time I used it. I have had other similar brushes last several months.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this brush instead of the previous one I was replacing because I liked the dual brush head. The soft side is great for showering and the stiff side is great for exfoliating. Unfortunately the bristles fell out in clumps during the first use.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: unsanitary
customer_reviews.text: Fresh out of the packaging and the brush has got some type of oil on it. I'm thinking it was previously used and returned and by luck of the draw I received it. You can even see how the oil seeped through the packaging so I'm not sure how you could not detect this before mailing it out. I consider it a pretty good lesson not to buy items that can previously be used for personal hygiene. I received it today and will definitely be returning it or taking it apart for a craft project. GROSS
customer_reviews.author: Craftin Gran

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for all features listed... what about durability?
customer_reviews.text: This product does an exceptional job of looking like a fantastic shower brush and as such should be framed and mounted upon delivery. Should you choose to use it however, you will find that after not 2, or 3, but in the 1st week hairline cracks appear in the plastic bristle base. By the following week you should find that the bristles have begun to splay and get washed down the drain and at the end of the month those hairline cracks will have become chasms and your fine model shower brush will look nothing like what you bought. On the upside you will still have the wooden handle to beat rugs?
customer_reviews.author: Derek A.

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months this brush did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Update: After 4 months this brush is useless. Not as durable as originally thought. I would not recommend this product for daily use. Brush is of good construction. Especially like the exfoliating side. I hope to get many months of use out of this brush before having to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C.

customer_reviews.title: merchandise well packaged and in good condition. This is a good quality brush
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in time, merchandise well packaged and in good condition.This is a good quality brush, bristles are well placed, the wood is smooth and the rubber at the end of the handle is a brilliant idea. The price is also great! Thank You for a quality brush with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I expect an item used on the body to be sold as new like advertised. This brush is definitely not brand new. It also smelled like soap whe. I smelled the bristles.It looks used ,dirty and unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: S.Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as some others
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this brush is about what you pay for... average. The soft side is very soft, if that’s what you’re looking for, but the stiff side (that I bought the brush for) is far too soft for my shower needs. More importantly, after just a couple of weeks of use the wood is starting to show a bit of mildew, which means it is headed straight to the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: The V

customer_reviews.title: ... brush (lighter colored) is just right for sensitive skin like mine. But since I have limited movement of ...
customer_reviews.text: The soft brush (lighter colored) is just right for sensitive skin like mine. But since I have limited movement of my arms the straight design makes it awkward to use on your back. Needs to be curved and about two inches longer. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cynde

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Well Made Brush
customer_reviews.text: Very happy and well pleased with this brush! After having already purchased a similar wooden handled brush but a different brand that very soon fell apart, I was delighted to find this brush much, much stronger and better built. It is a secure brush, and love the rubber handle grips on the sides. Having back and reach issues, it does everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: James Milson

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Metal brad nails scratches my skin! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This brush broke apart as I was washing my back and gave me some nice scratches on my back from the nails they used to attach bristles to wooden brush. A real eye opener . Cheap plastic fell apart as I washed! Exposing nails installed to hold to brush handle. Thanks I’d post scratches but I’m not gonna attempt to take pictures of my backside. Buyers look elsewhere this is dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC TULPPO

customer_reviews.title: 3 Stars because.....
customer_reviews.text: Both sides of the brush are wonderful. Easy to use. However, my issue is with the wood. After the first week, it started to turn grey and black. I keep my shower spotless and it has plenty of air flow to dry out after use so nothing in my bathroom remains moist or humid. Had to throw out by the second week which was too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Brush worked for a few months of light use (2x-3x times per week). Always handled with care. Then it broke unexpectedly, a 1/4 of the bristles broke - see pic. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had a brush before but it was the kind where the brush head could be removed, but the head kept falling off and it was looking bad from years of use, so I tossed it. I was looking for a back brush that was solid and good quality. This one is, one side of the brush is really soft and comfortable, the other is a very thick coarse brush which is great for removing dead skin. I've used both sides and it's really great. I can't think of anything I would do to change it.
customer_reviews.author: LAMCD258

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to replace a boar's bristle brush that I accidentally broke after having it for quite a while. I apparently did not read the description thorough enough to read that the soft bristles were made of nylon. If I had read that I would not have purchased the scrubber at all. So, that is on me. The real disappointment, however, is the firm bristle part of the scrubber. The bristles were short and not very firm. After just a couple of uses, they started to mat. The brush was not nearly as good as boar bristle brushes I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This Exfoliator Makes Me So Angry
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this in the shower I get so mad. The brush bristles are too soft to feel like you're doing anything at all. Every time I use it, I think "This is so bad, I have to leave a bad review"; but as soon as I get out of the shower, I think "That brush is so bad, it's not even worth my time to write a review.". Anyways, here I am.
customer_reviews.author: Ksteffen0530

customer_reviews.title: Plastic splits and breaks just as badly as the wood does.
customer_reviews.text: I've had brushes like this before where the bristles were mounted in holes drilled into the wood itself, and over time the wood would crack from being in the water every day, and the bristles would fall out bunch by bunch. I thought that because this brush had a plastic plate that the bristles were attached to instead of being attached directly to the wood that the cracking issue wouldn't be so bad. Well, 8 months into owning this brush the white plastic holding the bristles started splitting just like the wood had, and the bunches of bristles started falling out again. So in the end it was really no better than the solid wooden brush I'd had before.
customer_reviews.author: Haven

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wood around brush end split in 3 places the first time I used it; never dropped it. Handle is too straight for someone with manky shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Forburger

customer_reviews.title: Finally ! Pefect Back / Body Long Handled Shower Brush
customer_reviews.text: After multiple purchases of Long Handled Back / Body Shower Brush, finally found THE ONE Long teak wood handle - 17 Inches Can reach every spot of my back Bristles on Both Sides Boar Bristle Side - For thorough scrubbing, great for cleaning nails, dirty feet, etc Other side, is softer, works great for entire body Brush is very reasonable cost Ergonomic handle, does not slip in hand, when soapy Fantastic Brush No more Shower Scrunchies, Washcloths, Loofahs, Nail Brush , This shower brush is all you need Purchased 2nd one, to have on hand
customer_reviews.author: mary johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like this brush but it needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush because it had 2 different brushes. A soft brush and a harder brush. My issue is that both sides feel exactly the same. I was looking for something with a little more firmness. The soft brushes are great for my gf but I want a little more firmness for my self. Other than that the brush is good. It is a sturdy brush and easy to handle in the shower. It is a good length and does not bend. I just wish the brushes on one side could be more firm.
customer_reviews.author: Friendly Neighborhood I.T. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Got incredibly moldy for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely careful to rinse it well, and store it properly after use. We are super germaphobes so this is a big deal. Even with taking care of it really well, all of a sudden I go to use it and overnight one night it was suddenly BLACK with mold! There had been no sign of this before which tells me it had been growing from the inside of the brush! This is horrifying and means I had been "cleaning" my bare skin with mold for days if not much longer! It went straight out to the trash. I am very disappointed. It seemed like such a lovely brush but the mold is disgusting and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Laxson

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of "soft"
customer_reviews.text: This totally met my expectations. I was concerned the bristles would be either too hard or two soft, but it is a two sided brush and the bristles are just right. Love the wooden handle. It's a great buy and very well made. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Budnick

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this body brush to use along with my exfoliating body wash. The brush is amazing, it's length allows me to wash hard to reach areas. Soft bristles that gently scrubs away dirt and dead skin. My skin is left feeling super smooth. Very well packaged, my body brush came with a seller's note thanking me for my purchase, which I thought was cute! Absolutely no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for less than a month and one whole side cracked and fell apart leaving exposed nail heads.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comes Apart Easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s been about a month since I got this. It hangs away from water-shot. One side is already coming off.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. CURTICE

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is well made and the right length. The soft bristles are just about right and the side I use the most. The stiff bristles are stiff and provide a good scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: bkay9

customer_reviews.title: love the rough side
customer_reviews.text: I love the rough side. Never even used the soft one, but the rough side is awesome! The bristles were in a good shape for around 3 month or so. Not sure if it's a good or bad duration, but I think it's reasonable considering the cost. Already got an additional brush for my mom, and will be buying a replacement for my brush soon.
customer_reviews.author: NAS

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Brush But Some Flaws
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush in general. Made solidly with a nice finish. There are two sides, a softer brush and a stiffer bristled side. The second side is nice for scrubbing and scratching your back in the shower. My brush showed up with some bristles missing- like a small empty area near the middle- on one side. I like it a lot and it has held up, although both ends seem to be getting damaged by water. I dry it and I hang it so it’s not sitting on a wet surface , yet the wood on the very to the brush head and the handle are almost black from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: B. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I can actually say that a shower brush is a good investment. Usually they are very soft bristled and you are left with having to rewash your back in order to feel you did it right. With the stiff bristle side of this brush that is no longer an issue. I have recommended this brush to those of my friends that get hot and sweaty at work and they all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Erenstoft

customer_reviews.title: Not very practical for the intended purpose.....Will keep til I find a good use for it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great..fine finish..Excellent item..IF..you want to place it in a display case.. The straight line handle needs to be curved..&.. is too short for a big OR tall person..The finish is slick..very difficult to hold..& the rubber handle inserts do NOTHING to solve the problem.. The soft bristles would be fine for anyone BUT the so-called "stiff" bristles are NOT stiff.. Will keep it till I find a good use for it..
customer_reviews.author: Patrick De'Ment

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but very soft brush.
customer_reviews.text: Brush is too soft to really scrub very well. Good if you need more of a gentle rubbing, but to feel anything, or to scrub dead skin, dirt, grimy feeling from sweating on your back, etc., brush is too soft. Hey, a little grossly vivid, but, my truth.
customer_reviews.author: thousandwatts

customer_reviews.title: Solid wood shower brush
customer_reviews.text: Has a substantial feel that implies durability; every use doesn’t leave me feeling that the handle is bending and about to break. Even though the handle is wood, it doesn’t feel as if it’s going to warp. And I like the scrubbing and exfoliating effects of this brush. However the brush surface is rather small compared to the dollar store loofah I was using previously; if you don’t mind that and don’t mind a smaller surface to apply body wash, you’ll do fine here and have a shower brush that will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nakao

customer_reviews.title: Wake every Morning, like Clockwork of a Shower Brush that reaches all areas . .
customer_reviews.text: Shower every morning; like clockwork : This Shower Brush works like a Charm . . . my wake is complete; once I’ve had a Shower with this Versatile Shower Brush that reaches everywhere you need it to go!... With the length of a long armed individual; this shower brush reaches “top - to - bottom,” using one side for soft strokes, the other side for, strong strokes; each one leaving you feeling, “SQEAKY CLEAN!”... I absolutely, love it!... I leave it in the windowsill of my bathroom window; so it’s easy to reach for every morning!...
customer_reviews.author: SANDI  C./you

customer_reviews.title: Two different bristle types on one brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the bristle brush. it has a very soft bristle side I use for my face and neck and then flip is over for a slightly harder bristle for the rest of the body. The harder side is not to stiff and I have inadvertently used it on my face without issue. I have had this for six months, daily showers and not rust or bristle are falling out. I do hang it up on a 3m hook so water drips out of it. I would purchase this brush again.
customer_reviews.author: RealPerson

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for the perfect shower brush.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third shower brush I have tried in as many years. It's an attractive brush and is well-constructed. The hard and soft bristles on each side of the brush are a nice feature, although I would trade in both sides for something in the middle (yes, I know, Goldilocks here). My only real complaint, though, is the slippery wood handle if you like to put soap on the bristles when scrubbing your back (it is a shower brush, after all). The two rubber pads help a little, but not enough. It needs bigger pads or more of them. Otherwise, plan on dropping the brush a lot. Fortunately, it is well-constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Zonee

customer_reviews.title: Adequate.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is okay but I should have bought one with a curved neck as they are easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse's Note

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, doesn't get moldy
customer_reviews.text: I dislocated my shoulder and for 6 months couldn't wash my back. This brush saved me. A previous brush I had bought got moldy on one side, but this one is light-weight, easy to hold with rubber grippers on the handle, good and long to reach everywhere, and has soft on one side and stiffer bristles on the other for different kinds of cleaning. I don't have to reach too far with my injured shoulder to wash my entire back, so I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: conoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Add a photo?
customer_reviews.text: Its a great shower brush, no removable head (it will fall apart) like some others I've owned. Grip seems secure and not slippery, helps to reach top of feet. You still need flexible shoulder joints to scrub your back but the handle is long enough to make that task easier. Remember handle length is a feature to consider for a shower brush, this one seems to have it all.
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: plastic holding on brush bristles was broken on one side
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice that the plastic that holds the bristles on one side was pulled away and cracked until after I used it. I should have inspected it when I unpacked it before using it. I found the handle a little slippery even though it has 2 small rubber knobs. I gave a 3 for softness because one side is soft like it is supposed to be. The other side is harder like it is supposed to be. If it had a better grip so not so slippery and if it did not come cracked I would give it a much better review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing product on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is really not 5 star because it is 10 star product. It really help exfoliating your dead skin and make it clear skin, my hands and elbows had so much rough but after just few used my dead skin fell off and the soft skin started appearing. I had so many pimples on my back because its is almost impossible to clean your back but this product is amazing, where hands couldn’t reach and clean I have now the ability to clean. My wife says that my back has changed to bright and soft almost all pimples gone. We don’t like this product because we love it, like is only a miner thing for this Product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Naveed Pervez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality design
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made brush. Soft side and medium soft side. Handle is wide enough to grip with soapy hands and long enough to reach all parts of body. Bristles seem to be durable and doesn't seem to bend easily.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 3 weeks of using, bristles are not nearly dense enough or stiff enough! I'd give it 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright...
customer_reviews.text: There’s no big problems at the moment and I’ve been using this for a few weeks or so. One side of the bristles could be a tad more stiff but it still does it’s job. The only major thing I have to complain about is that trying to get it to brush up my back is a little awkward, especially the shoulder blades. On another note, the feel of the wood itself is really nice and the handle has non-slip grip so that’s really convienent. All in all, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles started coming out after one week. Upon closer inspection I noticed the white plastic base of the brush had several cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating, comfortable and sturdy. Great brush.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this combo brush. One side is stiff bristles which provide a very refreshing exfoliating feeling. The other side has soft bristles which are gentle on sensitive areas. The handle is long for easy reach and soft rubber inserts provide a comfortable and secure grip. I’ve had it for a couple of months and it's holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Back Exfoliater!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic scrunchy body scrubbers didn’t work for me and they were hard to keep clean. The soft side bristles have brought the skin on my back to being smooth and blemish free! Back is less itchy too. The harder bristled side also workS at exfoliating the dry skin on my feet. Very happy with this brush and keeping it clean is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: ALA

customer_reviews.title: Bristles fell out first use
customer_reviews.text: The big problem is during the first use the bristles started falling out. Like allot of them. If you can put it together better and make it so the bristles are secure, I would try it again.
customer_reviews.author: Norallia

customer_reviews.title: Bristles and handle are the best I have found
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely buy this brush again. The wooden handle is easy to hold on to in the shower. It doesn’t get slippery. The brush bristles are a good stiffness because some brushes that I’ve purchased in the last are too rough. Good quality. Good packaging and a friendly customer service note.
customer_reviews.author: M. Trabbold

customer_reviews.title: Great For Washing Areas Hard To Reach
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and have a hard time washing my lower legs. This is like an extended hand and I can wash all the way down to my ankles without bending much at all. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspect for damage before you use it.
customer_reviews.text: Good but only lasted 3 months. The plastic backing cracks and falls apart. Be careful if the plastic breaks. The broken pieces can scratch of cut the skin. Inspect before using.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: The price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the back or to use for the body brush. İts nice one side is soft and other Side is more girmek brush.. I bought Two brushes for the price of one .. voila....
customer_reviews.author: Asti Asuman Gulbey

customer_reviews.title: Better than Most
customer_reviews.text: This brush is different from others in two important ways; First the handle is a part of the brush and does not detached-other brushes have a notch that handle pushes into and over time it warps and detaches as one brushes, and second the brush is two sided, very good for soft and stiffer brushing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Black Unger

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, mold soon after 30days.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest beef with this brush is that it started to crack and grow mold inside. Like it wasn't meant to be used in a wet environment or something. Then there's the handle. In hindsight a straight handle isn't the best. I still can't get the very middle of my back. I think a curved handle would give a much better angle.
customer_reviews.author: CK Twain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brush
customer_reviews.text: Nice wooden handle, two sides of brushes (one soft, one coarse), and it's affordable. I have nothing negative to say, this is a well made product that isn't over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Wilson

customer_reviews.title: BODY BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM THE BODY BRUSH WORKS GREAT IM 85 YEARS OLD AND NOE I CAN REACH THE LOWER PART OF MY BACK AND MY LEGS....THANK AMAZON.......
customer_reviews.author: DN1

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: One side is somewhat soft, but would have preferred it to be a bit more soft since opposite side is decently course. It serves it's purpose for scrubbing my back. I would like the rope on it to be a little bigger to hang on large shower heads if you don't have a hook of some sort in your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: this is not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it 2 months before it has mold and mildew growing on the creases, and I hang it to dry every day in the shower so not sure why it's already doing this. plus the handle is very hard to grip; it hurts my hand and the bristles are already flattening out. I don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: High Quality-Dual Softness Options-Nice Finish
customer_reviews.text: It is a very substantial brush and if there is any downside it might just be the mass. But having the two brush heads makes it very convenient. The fit and finish are first rate. My spouse tossed my last brush because she thought the black mold had taken it over, but it was just hair dye! This unit has not stained, so hopefully that will keep it out of the trash by an overzealous wife.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N. Burton

customer_reviews.title: very well made product
customer_reviews.text: I'm super impressed by this product. It's well built and sturdy. The handle has built in grips to make it easy to hold and it's long enough to reach anywhere on my back. One brush is fairly stiff, the other is soft, making it adaptable to my needs. I highly recommend this brush.
customer_reviews.author: author of "How to Start and Run your own Computer Repair Business"

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I just got my package and i already love it. It’s so nice and the grip is amazing. It’s very durable and i can’t wait to use this on my back. I’ve been getting some pimples since i can’t reach to the back of me to scrub. This product will help me reach with it’s extra long ness, i am super excited to use this later.
customer_reviews.author: Jodye

customer_reviews.title: Reaches all the hard places
customer_reviews.text: This brush is fabulous, I got it to reach my feet and lower legs in the shower... It's great, both sides are soft and it was delivered on time and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Gojira55

customer_reviews.title: This brush really helps
customer_reviews.text: This brush helps me get to the itchy spots on my back. I like that it has two sides; one soft, the other stiffer. Since I'm only 5'11⁄2", the handle is very long and bit awkward to use. I reallly should have purchaed a brush with a curved handle. That said, after showering and using this brush 5 or 6 times, I find that my skin is smother and less itchy (I have excema).
customer_reviews.author: FIGARO

customer_reviews.title: If this caught your eye, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this brush but so far so good. One side soft other side stiffer but not hard. My skin is very dry and I cannot get my back now I can with this brush, it exfoliates. Eventually I will learn all this does. The customer service is exceptional! I've received 2 emails one of them telling me not to forget to register for the warranty. Now I need one that puts lotion on. If this caught your eye, don't hesitate buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this brush
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting much more after seeing the high ratings. I like a much firmer brush. The handle slips from my grip, I am not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kingzoo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 6' 5" 74 year old back.
customer_reviews.text: This brush replaces a back brush that had a brush head that was detachable from the handle. It always detached when I was trying to scrub my back. This brush is fantastic. I use it every day in the shower. The softer bristle side works well for me. The not so soft side is great for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Dual Soft Side/Firm Side Shower Brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Unlike many people, I prefer a more firm shower brush!!! I love that there are dual sides~soft AND firm! To clean under my fingernails, I do enjoy the soft side, for everything else, I LOVE the firm side! I LOVE the nice, LONG handle! It has become my new favorite shower brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: CalGirl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice brush. Soapy hands make it hard to hold on to. Update.......one side of the brush fell off because the fasteners rusted out. Not a good feeling when you're using the brush and the remaining fasteners rip your skin open. Unless you're into pain, don't buy this brush.
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price, 2 different brush coarsenesses
customer_reviews.text: This is a great length, and the blue things on the handle are a tough plastic kind of like the rubber sole of a shoe, so they do not get grimy in the shower only make it much easier to hold on to. The wood does not crack even when soaked for a while, and one side has a very soft brushed and 1 side has a bit of a course or brush. They both work very well with any kind of soap, dry easily completely in the shower, and don't have that odd smell after a while that many shower brushes do. When this 1 wears outcome I intend to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Culy

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Had an old bath brush..... This one is soo much better. Handle has a grip so you can actually hold on to it while you scrub hard to reach places.... Soft side and more firm side. Will have this baby for years. May even purchase another for my significant other can have one, because I do NOT share. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: nyla martens

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: The brush arm length is just right. There are different bristles on each side. One side satisfies those that appreciate a softer scrub and the flip side is for those who like rougher bristles for exfoliating. This brush is truly a win win! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Sigh
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this is a great shower brush! It has a more intense side and a soft side-kind of like me! :) Long enough to reach your feet and also down your back. I bought a little plastic S hook and hang it right in the shower to use every day. I'd buy it again for myself and for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Durable Back Scrubber
customer_reviews.text: The Vive Shower Brush is a great product. It is durable, and gets the job done. I can't tell you how many backscrubbers I have purchased that have fallen apart in a month or two. This backscrubber has outlasted them all. BTW: I am male, so I do scrub vigorously as well.
customer_reviews.author: SamuraiCat

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has a firm side and a soft side. It serves it's purpose and I like having the option of firmness for various body parts.
customer_reviews.author: KES

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great for itchy back. I was using a back scratcher before which was damaging the skin. This works so much better because of wider coverage and easy on the skin. The two brushes give just the right choice of stiffness. The textured rubber patches on the handle is not very effective as a non-slip feature, though. They are too small or too few. The handle needs to have more aggressive texture for a better grip to use in a shower.
customer_reviews.author: aJayM

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns after reading some reviews that said the bristles fell out of the brush. I have had no problems with this product. It seems good quality with the bristles on both sides remaining firmly in place. Do be sure to check the stated length of the brush to be sure it is what you want. I was surprised that it was an inch or so shorter than the brush I was replacing, but that is my own fault for not checking the length of the current brush. I don't really miss the extra inch, and would buy this brush again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: The best available option
customer_reviews.text: The best option I could find. If you are looking for a back scrubber with a hard and soft side, this is the best you’ll find. I’ve bought many that didn’t hold up. I’ve been using this one for months In the shower and it is still holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: General King Merchandise

customer_reviews.title: ... it after one month now can't return too late bad buy!
customer_reviews.text: It got mold on it after one month now can't return too late bad buy !
customer_reviews.author: PAT MADDOX

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold, as it gets slippery when wet and soapy
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend this product for use as a back scrubber in the shower. When used normally with soapy hands it is practically impossible to use. After rinsing one's hand it is still slippery and hard to use. My water is very soft. It may be better if the water was harder. If you intend to use this in the shower, I recommend finding something with a better grip. Recommend you find something with a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shower brush
customer_reviews.text: The softer side is great for everyday washing your back. I use the stiffer side for the calluses on my feet but it is a little too hard for your regular skin. I wish it had a little flexibility in the handle with it being wood it is pretty stiff and hard to reach certain places if you don't have a great range of motion in your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, too long
customer_reviews.text: Not quite what I had in mind. The bristles are too soft on both sides (even the harder ones are super soft). Handle is a bit long. Maybe good for people with mobility issues, but not as practical as I thought. Overall ok, will give the brand perhaps another shot with a different product but this one just missed it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Frost

customer_reviews.title: Bristles to SoFT
customer_reviews.text: This brush has two sides one soft other “supposed to be harder” it is not! I prefer more firmer and/or harder bristles. My back gets itchy I love scrubbing it in shower with a rougher bristle brush. Oh well better luck next buy!!🥴
customer_reviews.author: FrancescaB

customer_reviews.title: My new Love
customer_reviews.text: Im in Love with this dry skin body brush. I have bought multiple loufas earlier exclusively for exfolating purposes, none of them proved to be this good. Two sides : one for dry skin and the other for wet makes it a simply perfect requirement. The only problem i found using this brush is it being a bit too heavy. I love it though. (:
customer_reviews.author: AAR.

customer_reviews.title: Move on
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy again. There are two sides of bristles. One has a more synthetic feel: that side doesn’t hold soap at all, won’t foam up. The other side are more natural feel and collapsed after the first use. I do like the handle (grips).
customer_reviews.author: Bradley T. Bjork

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, too soft bristles and slippery handle
customer_reviews.text: first, the boar bristle brush is too soft for me. i like a little rougher bristle for exfoliation. don't even use the other side because bristles are way too soft. no grip on the handle so once soap is applied it is very slippery and hard to use. it does seem to be resisting water damage pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Wandagm

customer_reviews.title: Valuable shower aide.
customer_reviews.text: This dual sided shower brush saves me both time and space. I use the soft bristled side to apply my body wash then with just a flip of my wrist I use the firmer bristled side to scrub or scratch my back. It is long enough to reach all area’s of my back and comes with a hand loop for when your hands are slippery from bathing soap.
customer_reviews.author: PopPop357

customer_reviews.title: Works well, feels great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The two brushes are great for a soft wash or a bit rougher scrub. I actually find myself using it on parts I can reach because it feels good. The rubber pads make it a little easier to hold and the string enables me to hang it on the shower caddy. Not sure how long the wood will keep its color in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing brush!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it’s two different bristle sides with one firm for my feet and one soft I use for my back. The handle is very comfortable and the length is perfect. It also has rubber strips on the handle that makes it easy to hold even with soapy hands.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: REFRESHING!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it... even has a bit of a citrus smell, prob will pass but so far, it's still nice.... having 2 sides is lovely... softer and harsher...great combo! Don't even miss that the width is not as large as my last! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Nahaia

customer_reviews.title: oh my!
customer_reviews.text: firstly I love that you can use this in or out of the shower. also I liked how neither side's bristles weren't too stiff or too soft. each side has it's own job & this brush does it well. it also feels very durable like it'll def last awhile & the shipping was super fast. I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Reaches all 4 corners of your back with ease
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good exfoliating brush. It has a soft and hard brush on the handle. It’s easy to hold and it feels good on your skin. It’s long enough to reach the parts if your back that you are unable to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Keiffer

customer_reviews.title: Great brush.
customer_reviews.text: The bristles on the brush are excellent. One aide is softer than the other. However the bristles are definitely sturdy and not the softest. I like that for exfoliation. Some people may not. The reach works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Failla

customer_reviews.title: Here is what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Great product one rough side one soft side everything is awesome build quality is top notch but the soft brush probably won’t last u that long because it just bends in all different types of directions
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: perfect length handle and ....
customer_reviews.text: Really like the two different brushes , one on each side. The length of the handle is perfect, but having the rubber grippers a bit higher up as well would be helpful for shorter arms, otherwise I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: lee hall

customer_reviews.title: A little on the stiff side
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I love the stiffer side to wash the soles of my feet, but even the soft side can be a little scratchy if you use it on you're back. It works if you're careful with strength, though. I just wish it was a tad softer.
customer_reviews.author: Rogério Naressi

customer_reviews.title: How did I go through life without this as long as I have.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how I managed to go through life without this! Whether exfoliating my back or just washing it with the soft side...just love how it leaves my back feeling clean! I use it every other night if not every night for about a year now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice brush for washing my back
customer_reviews.text: A good quality brush. I like the 2 sided brushes. One side is softer then the other. A Great product for the price point. I have only used it twice, so need more time to see how long it holds up. Overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: This brush is just right.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is soft enough on one side and just stiff enough on the other to be effective but not tear up your skin. I have limited flexibility but this brush makes it possible to get my entire back by myself
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviewers have said, this product is not very good quality. I scraped my finger on the already, cracked handle, when I removed it from it's packaging and where the nylon bristles are located, one small section is completely void of any bristles, at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rayt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, collecting mold
customer_reviews.text: A wash cloth will work better than this. The brush came loose after first use. I found it not very useful. After just a few day on the shower door, mold is starting to grow on it. Use a wash cloth so you can run it through the washer after use.
customer_reviews.author: Declan Amatus

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst purchase I have ever made. Out of the box the bristles were terribly firm. Once they had started loosening up the plastic molding holding the bristles in started to deteriorate. Basically by the time it was soft enough to use the bristles had all fallen out. Please save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aries4

product_meta.title: Vive Body Brush - Dry Skin Shower Exfoliator - Bath Scrubber For Wash Brushing, Exfoliating, Cellulite, Foot Scrub, Leg Exfoliant - Soft and Stiff Massage Bristles - Wooden Long Handle
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVELY EXFOLIATE AND CLEAN SKIN: Create an at-home spa experience with the Vive body brush set. Featuring an extended reach dual-sided body brush works to effectively exfoliate and cleanse the skin, improving circulation and skin health. The boar bristle brush is extra soft and safe for use on the sensitive skin of the face and neck for a smoother, softer appearance.

DUAL BRUSHES FOR WET OR DRY BRUSHING: Stiff boar bristles exfoliate and smooth the skin, effectively smoothing patches of rough skin. The boar bristles are also great for cleaning hard to reach areas with body wash or scrubs. The second side of the dual body brush has soft nylon bristles to gently cleanse, soften and smooth the skin. Perfect for sensitive skin.

LONG EXTENDED REACH HANDLE: Constructed with lotus wood, the wooden handle is over 17” (44cm) long. The extended handle allows you to easily clean hard to reach areas such as the back and the feet. Additionally, textured rubber patches are included to create a secure, nonslip grip when properly adhered to the lotus wood handle. Large enough to slide on your wrist to prevent dropping the brush, a cord loop is also attached to the dual brush handle for convenient hanging storage.
DURABLE HANDLE: Coated with a clear waterproof layer, each lotus wood handle will not split or crack with prolonged use.
VIVE GUARANTEE: 60 day unconditional guarantee so you can purchase now with confidence.
